thoughts.author: Mark Twain
thoughts.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

thoughts.author: Walt Disney
thoughts.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

thoughts.author: Nelson Mandela
thoughts.quote: It always seems impossible until itâ€™s done.

thoughts.author: Albert Einstein
thoughts.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

thoughts.author: Steve Jobs
thoughts.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

thoughts.author: Confucius
thoughts.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.

thoughts.author: Henry Ford
thoughts.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

thoughts.author: Mahatma Gandhi
thoughts.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

thoughts.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
thoughts.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

thoughts.author: Theodore Roosevelt
thoughts.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

thoughts.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
thoughts.quote: The time is always right to do what is right.

thoughts.author: Helen Keller
thoughts.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.

thoughts.author: Mother Teresa
thoughts.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
